content.heading: <output> Tag
paragraphs: The <output> tag displays the result of a calculation.

Example: <form oninput="x.value=parseInt(a.value)+parseInt(b.value)">
  <input type="number" id="a" value="50">+
  <input type="number" id="b" value="25">=
  <output name="x" for="a b"></output>
</form>

content.heading: Browser Support
paragraphs: Supported since Chrome 10, Edge 13, Firefox 4, Safari 5.1, Opera 11.
